Posts.Content: Sep 15, 2014 04:53PM aussielovergirl wrote: I'm only about 8 weeks out from radiation, but I am having shooting pains and real soreness in my breast.  I also have a lump/scar tissue under the incision spot.  the pain is strange - some times it stops me in my tracks, but at the moment nothing. it just comes and goes.   I have my 6 month mammogram this week and am very nervous about the pain they will cause me !!
Posts.Title: Pain after 9 years? bondiblonde bondiblonde

Posts.Content: Sep 15, 2014 07:19PM aussielovergirl wrote: Miminiemi Hi -- When is your first post radiation mammogram ?  Mine is also this week.  Not looking forward to it as sometimes I am really sore and tender still.  I'm just dreading the mammogram.  I also have a knot/scar where the incision was, so I feel like that will hurt getting squeezed too...   Can anyone else chime in with what their first post treatment mammogram was like ?? Thanks !
